content: wyif i-cord row 3 k3 *insert your rn into the hole under the horizontal strand 2 row below between the next 2 sts and pull up a loop of yarn yo k2tog tbl p1* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 4 k3 *k1 p2 sl1 purlwise wyif* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 5 k3 *sl1 purlwise wyib k2 pass the slipped st over the first two sts on your rn p1* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 6 k3 ssk k until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d row 7 k3 k2tog *p1 k2* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d row 8 k3 *p2 k1* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 9 k3 k1 *p1 insert your rn into the hole under the horizontal strand 2 row below between the next 2 sts and pull up a loop of yarn yo k2tog tbl* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 10 k3 *p2 sl1 purlwise wyif k1* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 11 k3 k1 *p1 sl1 purlwise wyib k2 pass the slipped st over the first two sts on your rn* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 12 k3 ssk k until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d row 13 k3 p2tog *k2 p1* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain k1 sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d row 14 k3 p1 *k1 p2* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 15 k3 *p1 insert your rn into the hole under the horizontal strand 2 row below between the next 2 sts and pull up a loop of yarn yo k2tog tbl* repeat from * to * until 5 sts remain p1 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 16 k3 p1 k1 *p2 sl1 purlwise wyif k1* repeat from * to * until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif row 17 k3 *p1 sl1 purlwise wyib k2 pass the slipped st over the first two sts on your rn* repeat from * to * until 5 sts remain p1 k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 18 k3 ssk k until 3 sts remain sl3 purlwise wyif 1 st decrease d please note that there are no decreases in row 19-24 row 19 k3 *p1 k2* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain p1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 20 k3 *k1 p2* repeat from * to * until 4 sts remain k1 sl3 purlwise wyif row 21 k3 *p1 insert your rn into the hole under the horizontal strand 2 row below between the next 2 sts and pull up
